verses.text: \w Have|strong="H1732"\w* mercy \w on|strong="H6440"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w*, O God, \w have|strong="H1732"\w* mercy \w on|strong="H6440"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w*; \w for|strong="H1732"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* hope \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w my|strong="H1732"\w* soul \w is|strong="H6440"\w* \w in|strong="H6440"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w*: I \w will|strong="H6440"\w* keep myself safely \w under|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* shade \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w your|strong="H6440"\w* wings, till these troubles \w are|strong="H6440"\w* past.

\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H0430"\w* send \w up|strong="H5704"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* cry \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* Most High \w God|strong="H0430"\w*; \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w who|strong="H5315"\w* \w does|strong="H5315"\w* \w all|strong="H5704"\w* things \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w me|strong="H5315"\w*.

\w He|strong="H0430"\w* \w will|strong="H0430"\w* send \w from|strong="H5921"\w* heaven, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* take \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w power|strong="H0410"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* whose desire \w is|strong="H0430"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* destruction. \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w will|strong="H0430"\w* send \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* mercy \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* good faith.

\w My|strong="H7971"\w* soul \w is|strong="H0430"\w* among lions; \w I|strong="H7971"\w* \w am|strong="H0430"\w* \w stretched|strong="H7971"\w* \w out|strong="H7971"\w* among \w those|strong="H3467"\w* \w who|strong="H0430"\w* \w are|strong="H8064"\w* \w on|strong="H0430"\w* fire, even \w the|strong="H7971"\w* sons \w of|strong="H0430"\w* men, whose teeth \w are|strong="H8064"\w* spears \w and|strong="H0430"\w* arrows, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* whose tongue \w is|strong="H0430"\w* \w a|strong="H7971"\w* sharp sword.

\w O|strong="H5315"\w* God, \w be|strong="H1121"\w* lifted \w up|strong="H3857"\w* higher than \w the|strong="H8432"\w* heavens; \w let|strong="H5315"\w* \w your|strong="H8432"\w* glory \w be|strong="H1121"\w* \w over|strong="H8432"\w* \w all|strong="H7901"\w* \w the|strong="H8432"\w* earth.

\w They|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H0776"\w* \w made|strong="H3605"\w* \w ready|strong="H7311"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* net \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* steps; \w my|strong="H3605"\w* soul \w is|strong="H0776"\w* bent \w down|strong="H5921"\w*; \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H0776"\w* \w made|strong="H3605"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* \w great|strong="H0430"\w* hole \w before|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w have|strong="H0776"\w* gone \w down|strong="H5921"\w* \w into|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w themselves|strong="H5921"\w*. (Selah.)

\w My|strong="H8432"\w* \w heart|strong="H5315"\w* \w is|strong="H5315"\w* \w fixed|strong="H3559"\w*, \w O|strong="H5315"\w* God, \w my|strong="H8432"\w* \w heart|strong="H5315"\w* \w is|strong="H5315"\w* \w fixed|strong="H3559"\w*; \w I|strong="H5315"\w* \w will|strong="H5315"\w* \w make|strong="H3559"\w* songs, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w give|strong="H5307"\w* praise.

\w You|strong="H3820"\w* \w are|strong="H0430"\w* \w my|strong="H3559"\w* glory; let \w the|strong="H3559"\w* instruments \w of|strong="H0430"\w* music \w be|strong="H3820"\w* awake; \w I|strong="H3559"\w* \w myself|strong="H3820"\w* \w will|strong="H0430"\w* \w be|strong="H3820"\w* awake \w with|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3559"\w* dawn.
\w I|strong="H5782"\w* will give you praise, O Lord, among \w the|strong="H5782"\w* peoples; \w I|strong="H5782"\w* will make songs \w to|strong="H5782"\w* you among \w the|strong="H5782"\w* nations.

\w For|strong="H5971"\w* \w your|strong="H3034"\w* mercy \w is|strong="H0136"\w* great, stretching up \w to|strong="H0136"\w* \w the|strong="H3034"\w* heavens, \w and|strong="H3034"\w* \w your|strong="H3034"\w* righteousness goes up \w to|strong="H0136"\w* \w the|strong="H3034"\w* clouds.

\w Be|strong="H8064"\w* lifted \w up|strong="H5704"\w*, O \w God|strong="H8064"\w*, higher \w than|strong="H1419"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w*, let \w your|strong="H3588"\w* glory \w be|strong="H8064"\w* \w over|strong="H5704"\w* \w all|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w earth|strong="H8064"\w*.
